reviews.positive_text:
Pleasant, helpful staff, lift to all floors, clean tidy rooms.  A couple of restaurants nearby, excellent Italian restaurant.  A small bar with a moderate selection of drinks in house.  A parking garage in the basement (entrance a bit tight for my large estate).
Limited hanging space for clothes, kettle and tea provided.  Two towels per occupant, shower gel/soap provided and hair dryer.  Free WiFi, good breakfast with attentive staff, cereal, fruit, yoghurt, cold meat, cheese boiled eggs, toast croissants, madeleines.

Air conditioning couldn't cool the room below 24.5 C, so a bit too warm for a good night's sleep.  Bathroom very small, shoulders touched the wall each side of wash basin when shaving, washing. reviews.negative_text: As a family room it was absolutely ok. two level, but big bed, two single beds. Those were way too soft in our point of view, so no one was really able to sleep well. The bathroom has seen better times, some shelved almost came down from the wall. But the most horrible thing: the parking garage. Seems it was made for Smarts only. The door of the trunk was hitting the ceiling, the spots themselves were simply tiny. But the worst thing was the way out and in. Really tiny, so a big scratch in the car was not to avoid :( So if you have a decent car, do yourself a favor and rather find sth outside of this garage.
